ComicInfo.Title: Chaos Theory: Part 1; Cover A
ComicInfo.Summary: U.S. on sale date: 2011-07-20. Cover by Alex Milne; colors by Josh PerezThe story goes back and forth between Optimus Prime and Megatron as they reminisce about their first encounter, as well as previous encounters, as he tries to find out why Megatron surrendered to the Autobots. It also goes into Megatron's origins and his way of thinking, how it came to be.
